person.persName: Abraham Hite Bowman (Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer and curator of Kentucky Univ)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer and university curator. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Atwood Tomlinson Bowman in Mercer County in October 1843. Father of Howard M. Bowman, John Atwood Bowman, Edward Stanley Bowman, Lida M. Bowman, Anna W. Bowman, Mary C. Bowman, Lucy G. Bowman, and Hite Bowman. Farmer in Mercer County in 1850. Owned ten enslaved persons in Mercer County in 1850. Farmer in Mercer County in 1860. Owned eighteen enslaved persons in Mercer County in 1860. Member of the board of curators of Kentucky University in 1865.
